conclusion: Overall, this was an interesting and engaging read with a unique blend of historical fiction and casual ghost storytelling. The well-developed characters, particularly the special needs individual, added depth and emotional resonance. Despite a slightly confusing start, the story held my attention and provided a satisfying listening experience.
